title: How to put music on your computer without downloading it - Quora

response.answer_text: I think “Imperfectly” probably has the answer you will use, but here are a couple more — you can rip it from a CD or another medium, you can create it yourself, or you can get or make a MIDI file and have software generate it from that. Seriously, though, sharing or copying from your phone is the most likely way, as Imperfectly said.
